name: Black N White (Tapeboiii)
description:
Escape the strange tower by jumping through many rooms. Some things aren't as obvious though... Luckily, you have your trusty MAGNIFYING GLASS to reveal that some things aren't so black and white.

The controls are simple

F for Fullscreen

Backspace to Return to the Menu

In Easy Mode:

W to Jump

AD to Move

S to Spawn and Explode a Bomb

In Hard Mode:

QWEADZXC to Impulse in the Corresponding Direction from the S Key

S to Spawn and Explode a Bomb

This game was made using Flowlab.io. Everything in this game was made by me, Tapeboiii, except for the sound effects provided by Flowlab.

It was made in two weeks for the 2023 Winter Flowjam.
